summary: An orphaned boy who dreams of being a ninja arrives in Hollywood to try and find his birth parents, where he gets mixed up in a crime.
cast: Lucas Grabeel|David Hasselhoff|Judy Jung-hwa Kang|Bree Turner|Gary Hudson|Patrick Gallagher|Terryn Westbrook|Lily Tien|Eric Tsang|James Tsai|Anthony Shim|Elise Estrada|Drew Scott|Johannah Newmarch|Tony Abatemarco|Zachary Michael Pertersor|Dong Soo Suh|Jae Min Park|Se-hong Jeon|Emily Morris|Bryung Ki Jeon|Lauren Dela Pena|Braleigh Nelson|Clay St. Thomas|Paula Giroday|Juliana Semenova|Daniela Dib|Peter Boulanger|Tanya Burka|Sylvain Drolet|Colleen Yuen|Maja Aro|Richard Chiu|Massi Furlan|Paul Lazenby|Brent Murphy|Willy Ortlieb
director: Directors: Mitchell Klebanoff (as Mitch Klebanoff), Kelly Sandefur
title: Dancing Ninja
